node.title: Person seriously injured after rock fall in Christchurch
node.description: The incident occurred around 12pm on Monday.
node.content: ["One person is in a serious condition in Christchurch Hospital after a suspected fall in the city's Port Hills.", "St Johns Ambulance responded to the incident just before midday at R\u0101paki Rock, a popular climbing spot.", "A fire crew also responded, helping to transport the patient to an ambulance waiting on the road below.", "R\u0101paki Rock has a reputation of injuries and even death in the past.", "In November 2019, Paul Corridon died while attempting a climb on the rock, which resulted in a coronial inquiry earlier this year.", "RNZ"]
